subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Through Friday’s games, P.K. Subban, 24, a charismatic native of Belleville, Ontario, was tied for second among all N.H.L. defensemen in scoring, with 21 points in 26 games.
